articles.title: EU joins US in ‘depriving China of the most advanced chips’, official says - South China Morning Post
articles.description: ‘You will always find Europe by your side when it comes to ensuring our common security in technology,’ Thierry Breton, EU internal-market commissioner, says.

articles.title: U.S. indicts 3 for plotting to kill Iranian American journalist - CBC News
articles.description: U.S. prosecutors have charged three members of an eastern European criminal organization with ties to Iran's government with conspiring to assassinate a journalist and activist who is an American citizen, Attorney General Merrick Garland said on Friday.

articles.author: Rich Pell
articles.title: Temp-sensing smart building material changes color to save energy ... - eeNews Europe
articles.description: Researchers at the University of Chicago’s Pritzker School of Molecular Engineering (PME) say they have designed a building material that changes its infrared color — and how much heat it absorbs or emits — based on the outside temperature.

articles.title: Germany allows the release of tanks to Ukraine - The Saturday Paper
articles.description: Great power rivalry Ukraine: Germany will send tanks to Ukraine after coming under pressure from European countries to allow delivery of its Leopard 2 tanks, which could turn the course of the war.
